id.description: The id of the maintenance window.

tags.description: The names of the checks and groups maintenance window should apply to.

startsAt.description: The start date of the maintenance window.

endsAt.description: The end date of the maintenance window.

repeatInterval.description: The repeat interval of the maintenance window from the first occurance.

repeatUnit.description: The repeat strategy for the maintenance window.

repeatEndsAt.description: The end date where the maintenance window should stop repeating.

created_at.description: The creation date of the maintenance window.

updated_at.description: The last date that the maintenance window was updated.
